8. PCB (Custom).::.From the Gerber files in the repo.::.$12.78 (+ shipping)
The total cost for this project is approximately **37.28$** (excluding shipping). I have separated the costs into the custom PCB fabrication and the necessary electronic components.
*   **Cost:** $12.78 (shipping included).  I actually used a $6 coupon. The actual price of the PCB is $18.78 (shipping included).
*   **Note:** There is no way to give a cart link or order details link or a payment method link on AliExpress as with JLCPCB.
